name: Abstraction (Lambent Studio)
description:
Abstraction is a curious mix between zen game and rage game, inspired by physics platformers and classic abstract art. Click and drag anywhere on the screen and launch yourself across the screen. Touching any of the red will cause you to be destroyed and restart the level.

IMPORTANT NOTES: 

If you become bent out of shape because you went too fast, or become stuck, press "R" to reset the level.
